abstract: AT&T says it is pumping an additional $2 billion into its wireless network to manage a coming wave of tablets and smartphones.
snippet: AT&T says it is pumping an additional $2 billion into its wireless network to manage a coming wave of tablets and smartphones.
lead_paragraph: Update | 6:59 p.m.  Correcting Mr. Stankey’s title.

headline.main: We Can iHandle It, AT&T Says
